content: In the silent, tightly controlled city of Stenograd, where daily life is shaped by an all-seeing algorithm called the Behavioral Compliance Index, discontent brews beneath the surface. After the mysterious death of Marek Halden, the system’s architect, cracks begin to form, and frustration turns to action when Nikola Petrak quietly enables thousands of residents to stage a daring ‘data strike,’ erasing their digital footprints and sending essential services into chaos. As public camaraderie grows and Council leaders split between heavy-handed crackdowns and calls for dialogue, street murals bloom and the city brims with defiance. Faced with a population united by resistance and a system on the brink, the Council finally agrees to meet citizens at the table, ushering in a new moment of hope and uncertainty for Stenograd.
